channel.title: Abouts on ENGVALL.IT

item.description:
Niklas Engvall

About me

IT-ninja with a strong passion for primarily Linux, k8s and automation with a solid ground from the infrastructure perspective.

ðŸ”¥ Technical Experience

Conoa AB

Senior DevSecOps Engineer - Consultant (Jan 2022 - Present)

I work as a consultant with focus on kubernetes, linux and automation. So far worked with Rancher, VMware Tanzu, RedHat Openshift and AWS EKS at different positions.

Tech lead in the deployment of various EKS clusters in AWS. This included automation using ansible to generate cloudformation stacks to handle all deployments as IaC. Various support systems as in managed Prometheus, S3-buckets for backup of clusters etc.
